create source test_source_1(
    col0 tinyint,
    col1 int,
    col2 bigint,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
);

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;

--load data dataset_1;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;

drop source test_source_1;
